function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of involvement of built environment professionals in malaria intervention programs","Impact":"Limited input from professionals may lead to less effective intervention strategies","Mitigation":"Incorporate built environment professionals into decision-making processes for malaria intervention efforts","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Malaria intervention program stakeholders, built environment professionals","Owner":"Malaria intervention program stakeholders, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate building design and construction leading to increased risk of vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Increased spread of vector-borne diseases due to ineffective building design and construction","Mitigation":"Implement effective building design and construction practices to combat the spread of vector-borne diseases","Technologies":"Innovative building materials, construction techniques, and drainage systems","People":"Construction professionals, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Construction professionals, architects, urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for the impact of building materials and techniques on disease prevalence","Impact":"Increased prevalence of vector-borne diseases due to the use of traditional building materials and techniques","Mitigation":"Evaluate and revise building materials and techniques to minimize the risk of disease prevalence","Technologies":"Advanced building materials, modern construction techniques","People":"Building designers, construction professionals, public health organizations","Owner":"Building designers, construction professionals, public health organizations"}]}
